suite.name: SWAPITests

test.name: 1. Verify swapi /people service returns total count of people and 10 results per page

kw.name: Given swapi service is up and running
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://swapi.dev/api/people/ path_url=/api/people/ headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: When I send request for people
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://swapi.dev/api/people// path_url=/api/people// headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Then Service should return valid response code
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: AND Service should return correct count of results
Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: AND total count should be correct
Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.name: 3. Verify swapi /people endpoint returns 404 when searched by invalid people id

GET

kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: When I send request for people
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://swapi.dev/api/people//1000 path_url=/api/people//1000 headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Then Service should return valid response code
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: AND Service should return a valid error response
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

test.doc: Invalid people id and response assertion

test.name: 4. Verify swapi /people service returns matching people's resources when searched by name

GET

kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: When I send request for people by name
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://swapi.dev/api/people/?search=Skywalker path_url=/api/people/?search=Skywalker headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Then Service should return valid response code
Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: AND total count should be correct
Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: AND Service should return results containing searched name
Get Length
kw.doc: Returns and logs the length of the given item as an integer.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

test.name: 5. Verify swapi /people service returns no matching people when searched by invalid name

GET

kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: When I send request for people by name
GET
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://swapi.dev/api/people/?search=no%20name path_url=/api/people/?search=no%20name headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
kw.doc: Sends a GET request.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: AND Service should return empty results
Should Be Empty
kw.doc: Verifies that the given item is empty.

test.doc: Search by invalid request and response assertion

suite.doc: This test suite contains scenarios for validating the swapi service people endpoint. Following use cases are covered: Test people endpoint returns total count of people with 10 results per page. Test people endpoint returns specific people resource per id passed in request. Test people endpoint returns 404 when searched by invalid people id. Test people endpoint returns matching people's resources when searched by name. Test people endpoint returns empty results when searched by missing name from star wars family. Test people endpoint returns the correct pagination urls for previous and next pages.
